title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 21 January 2014 - XWiki
content:

10:09 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
10:26 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
10:35 <sburjan> Hello devs. It seems that some of the services API javadoc are not working on http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/SRD/Navigation  
10:35 <sburjan> at least solr is not working  
10:36 <tmortagne> seems to work well for me  
10:36 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:36 <tmortagne> I click on $services.solr and I get SolrIndexScriptService  
10:37 <sburjan> I get a Not Found  
10:37 <sburjan> The requested URL /site/docs/xwiki-javadoc-4.1.x/org/xwiki/search/solr/internal/SolrIndexScriptService.html was not found on this server.  
10:37 <sburjan> even if I select version 5.0 in the version dropdown  
10:37 <tmortagne> "xwiki-javadoc-4.1.x" it does not looks like you are in 5.0  
10:38 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
10:40 <sburjan> that's my point exactly. I have selected 5.0, but it seems I still get 4.1.x  
10:40 <sburjan> ok, I have ckicked on the permalink link and now it's working. odd  
10:43 <autoditac> has joined #xwiki  
10:44 <tmortagne> sburjan: sometime version selector does not work well, try selecting another version and then 5.0 again  
10:44 <sburjan> yepp, that fixed it  
10:44 <tmortagne> but as far as I can see i'm in 5.0 by default (I did not selected it)  
10:45 <sburjan> yes, I was on 5.x be default also, but it was linking to 4.1.x.  
10:55 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
11:59 <gdelhumeau> tmortagne: about the rights  
11:59 <gdelhumeau> tmortagne: if I clearly state in the RN that the rights has been changed, then we should not have the WTF effect  
12:59 <autoditac> has quit  
13:11 <evalica> has quit  
13:18 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
13:19 <autoditac> has joined #xwiki  
13:43 <autoditac> has quit  
15:55 <andreeapopescu> has quit  
16:11 <cjd> has quit  
16:18 <sburjan> has quit  
16:24 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: would be nice to have a screenshot (in the RN, in the Wiki Module and in the JIRA issue) of the new XWikiServerClass sheet :)  
16:24 <vmassol> people love screenshots and it makes for nice release notes  
16:24 <gdelhumeau> ok  
16:32 <Kebir> has quit  
16:39 <vmassol> tmortagne: this issue is labelled as roadmap54: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-9671  
16:39 <tmortagne> vmassol: it should not, this has been moved for 6.0, see mail from gdelhumeau about that  
16:40 <gdelhumeau> I will explain it at the next roadmap meeting  
16:58 <evalica> vmassol: since the issue was voted in the roadmap54 roadmap the label stays and marks it was planned part of that release. If we port it to 6.0 and we vote it in the prioritization meeting, we will add a 'roadmap60' label, while we also keep 'roadmap54'  
16:59 <vmassol> evalica: I don't think this should be discussed here since it's internal to XWiki SAS  
16:59 <evalica> k :) just don't delete the label :P thanks
